### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️ ## Custom Footstep --- [Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/custom_footstep) Modifies the footstep sound of the entity that has the power. Type ID: `apugli:custom_footstep` --- ### Examples ```json { "type": "apugli:custom_footstep", "sound": "minecraft:block.amethyst_block.break" } ``` This example will replace the footstep of the entity that has the power with the `minecraft:block.amethyst_block.break` sound event.
```json { "type": "apugli:custom_footstep", "muted": true, "condition": { "type": "apoli:on_block", "block_condition": { "type": "apoli:in_tag", "tag": "minecraft:wool" } } } ``` This example will mute the footstep of the entity that has the power if the said entity is standing on any kind of Wool block.
